abstract: Peace prayers: St Patrick's Cath, N Y C
snippet: The only "right" way of obtaining peace throughout the world is for men to love God and their neighbors, the Rev. Joseph F. Flannelly, administrator of St. Patrick's Cathedral, said in a sermon at a special holy hour for peace yesterday at the cat...

headline.main: 2,500 AT CATHEDRAL HEAR PEACE PLEAS; Delegates of Catholic Groups Attend Opening of Month of Special Devotions FLANNELLY GIVES SERMON Men Must Love God and Their Neighbors, He Says, to Get Amity Throughout World

lead_paragraph: The only "right" way of obtaining peace throughout the world is for men to love God and their neighbors, the Rev. Joseph F. Flannelly, administrator of St. Patrick's Cathedral, said in a sermon at a special holy hour for peace yesterday at the cathedral.
